name: Xiào Ào Jiānghú 2: Wǔyuè Jiàn Pài
XIII
summary: Java port of "XIII"

name: Xi Coliseum
summary: Xi Coliseum is a sequel to the Devil Dice series, released only in Japan on the Sony PSP in 2006.

name: Xiaolin Showdown
summary: Lead a kung fu monk and his three martial arts warriors on an action packed quest to search and protect the Shen Gong Wu. Omi, a Kung Fu monk leads three young dragons-in-training on their globetrotting adventures to search and protect the Shen Gong Wu, mystical power objects that gives its possessor super powers, from a band of villains led by Evil Boy Genius Jack Spicer, his army of robots and an ancient witch Wuya. They fight for the Shen Gong Wu one showdown at a time, where the universe transforms itself into a mystical, hyper-reality world. Our heroes have to rely on their superb martial arts skills, wits, and the mystical powers of the Shen Gong Wu to fight evil. Based on the WB Kids animated series players control 4 warriors, working closely to together to combine their mystical powers, as they advance on their quest. Find and collect Shen Wong Gu while progressing thru an environment filled with hazards, enemies, and collectables. Compete in "Showdowns" that transport your warriors and test your martial arts skills. Battle epic bosses in winner-take all arena style combat. Six playable characters with mystical kung-fu powers.

name: Xiao Xiao No. 9: Fight Man
summary: Xiao Xiao 9 is part of the Xiao Xiao Flash series. It is a short beat 'em up in the vein of Final Fight, where a black stickman must traverse the animator's desk, beating up purple stickmen along the way. The hero has several attacks available: a regular punch or kick, a flying kick, a throw, and a roundhouse kick which knocks down all nearby enemies but costs a part of the hero's life bar. After making it through several fights, the hero climbs on top of the artist's computer to confront the final boss who has multiple health bars.

name: Xiongguan Mandao, Yi Meng Wan Li
summary: Find a way out, for a dream that never fade away.

name: XiuZhen Metaverse
summary: This is a simulation of the game, can be free in the game according to their own ideas to create their own skills, but also according to their own ideas to set up different attributes of the skills, so that each player has different attributes.

name: Xiao Xiao No. 6
summary:
Xiao Xiao No. 6 is the sixth installment in the Flash series Xiao Xiao, but only the third game. Like all previous installments, it once again consists of spectacular fight scenes featuring a black stickman.

The initial part of Xiao Xiao No. 6 is a series of more or less non-interactive fight scenes, where the player must simply keep pressing Space to keep the animation going, with no penalty for delaying. In the next scene, the hero's opponent is locked in a jail cell and the player's goal is to click levers at the bottom to activate crushers in order to kill the prisoner; it's not that easy because the prisoner is smart enough to avoid descending crushers. In the final scene, the player must press Space rapidly to fill a power bar before the time limit, so that the protagonist can deal a single powerful, finishing blow to his opponent; in the case of failure the player can immediately try again.

name: Xiǎo Guài Wù Bì Xū Sǐ
summary:
Little Monsters Must Die" is a casual idle game that combines pinball mechanics, strategy card gameplay, and RPG elements!
You will recruit a legion of knights, defeat evil bosses, and explore mysterious worlds.
Precise aiming and strategic positioning are the keys to victory.

Enjoy generous rewards, fair gameplay, and build a powerful army that belongs to you.
Join this world full of adventure and glory now!

name: Xiyan
summary:
The universe is too big and too old.
The Milky Way is just one of the hundreds of billions of galaxies in the universe, the sun is just one of the hundreds of billions of stars in the Milky Way, and the earth is just a speck of dust in the solar system.
Can anyone notice the tiny and short-lived lives that are wandering, crying, enduring, struggling, above that dust?
They are us, the last children of the earth...
- Xi, the descendant of the ancient god of the Arctic Ocean,
- Yan, the blue servant of the Old World,
- Xi, the man-made ancient god of the Pacific Ocean,
- Yan, the red servant of the New World.
All that we do, is it to continue to survive, or to end the pain?
Or, just to prove our existence...

name: XIII Century: Gold Edition
summary: XIII Century Gold Edition combines the highly successful strategy game XIII Century: Death or Glory with the follow-up sequel, XIII Century: Blood of Europe.XIII Century: Death or Glory is an RTS game which immerses players in the Middle Ages.

name: XIII
summary: A remake of the XIII game from 2003. The game is a first-person shooter where you play as Thirteen, a talented soldier who lost his memory and has been accused of killing the President of the United States. You first wake up injured and amnesic on Brighton Beach with the only clue being a small key and a mysterious tattoo XIII next to your clavicle. It’s now your job to search for answers through a 34 levels solo campaign. Don’t worry, you will find the appropriate weapon arsenal along the way. With questions not missing, neither are the bullets!

name: XI Sai Jumbo
summary:
XI JUMBO was released as a sequel to Devil Dice only released in Japan.
The rule is similar to its predecessor, but in this version, you can stack the dice vertically by lift up or jump with a die.

The classical "Trial - Time Limited" and "Puzzle" modes are also available on this version.
For new features, The "Battle" mode is entirely renewed with a garbage-attacking style.
In addition, a new task-solving trial, named "Norma Attack," is introduced.

name: Xiangsheng Simulator
summary: "Xiangsheng Simulator" is a humorous and witty adventure that takes you into the unique world of Xiangsheng. As a Xiangsheng Penggen, you'll team up with your Dougen partner to deliver a performance filled with laughter.

name: Xiān Lǚ Yì Wén Lù
summary: "Xiān Lǚ Yì Wén Lù" is a story-based role-playing game. Players assume the role of an ordinary person who is accidentally spotted by an immortal and embarks on a journey to immortality, gradually cultivating and becoming immortal. During this journey, you will encounter various strange and bizarre events, which you can participate in or observe from the sidelines.

name: XIII: Limited Edition
summary: A remake of the XIII game from 2003. The game is a first-person shooter where you play as Thirteen, a talented soldier who lost his memory and has been accused of killing the President of the United States. You first wake up injured and amnesic on Brighton Beach with the only clue being a small key and a mysterious tattoo XIII next to your clavicle. It’s now your job to search for answers through a 34 levels solo campaign. Don’t worry, you will find the appropriate weapon arsenal along the way. With questions not missing, neither are the bullets!

name: Xiānjiè Huàn Shì Lù
summary:
Immortal Fantasy World is a 3D MMO Xianxia mobile game, blending cultivation themes with an adorable, cartoonish art style, breaking away from traditional realistic designs.

The visual design adds a touch of elegance and fantasy, while the main characters are no longer fierce and intimidating.
Instead, they take on a refreshingly cute and charming look—from tough warriors cutting down monsters on the battlefield to adorable characters full of humor and mischief.

The game features an original four-stage lightness skill, “Water Treading”, allowing characters to walk and dash across water.
And of course, no Xianxia world would be complete without sword flying, a core element of cultivation.

Cultivate your inner energy, overcome heavenly tribulations, and achieve ascension—
soaring through the skies and overlooking all living beings as you freely roam the immortal realm.

In Immortal Fantasy World, not only can your character ride their sword and fly,
but they can also master the unique four-stage lightness skill, “Water Treading.”
Whether you’re rushing to complete quests or enjoying romantic dual flights with a companion,
lightness skill is an essential ability for every cultivator!

name: Xiaomei and the Flame Dragon's Fist
summary: Save your sister from the darkness in this authentic 16-bit kung fu action game, releasing outside Japan for the first time!

name: XIII: Lost Identity
summary: Imagine waking up to discover you’ve led several different lives. You are XIII, a man with a host of enemies and who faces danger at every turn as he goes in search of his past. Pursued by mysterious strangers and wanted for the assassination of the President of the United States of America, his life becomes a whirl of conspiracy and intrigue. Pay close attention to everything around you, because it will no doubt be your only chance to piece together XIII’s enigmatic past. Are you ready for an adventure unfolding at breakneck speed?

name: Xing: The Land Beyond
summary: You died. Welcome to XING: The Land Beyond, an atmospheric first-person puzzle adventure for desktops and virtual reality. Enjoy your peaceful escape from the chaotic world of the living, and travel the lands of the dead.

name: Xiu's SuperMarket
summary: 這是一個利用腳色，靠著技能攻打怪物，可以得到金幣用來購買更高等的武器，每當升等可以增加技能點來提升角色的技能，而隨著關卡上升，怪物的等級也會依循上升，並且有三種職業可以進行選擇遊玩，每種職業擁有不同的技能，以後會陸續新增更多職業。

name: XI O'Clock
summary:
Welcome to XI O'Clock, a thrilling game where you must explore hallways to find hidden anomalies. Your goal is to reach XI o'clock (11) by correctly identifying these strange occurrences.

Every time you spot an anomaly and pull the lever, you move one hour closer to your goal. But be careful—if you miss an anomaly, the clock resets, and you have to start over!

Can you keep your cool and make the right choices? Test your skills in a game where every second matters.

name: X Invader
summary: 'X Invader' is a roguelite game where you play a hacker infiltrating corporation servers. Join the 'Rinascita' group to uncover hidden secrets. Use colleagues' add-ons to defeat security codes.

name: Xiao Jun
summary: A dark, emotional RPG set in modern China. Follow Xiao Jun, a rural boy caught in a brutal journey from schoolyard bullying to street violence, love, betrayal, and revenge. A raw story of survival in an unforgiving world.

name: XIII: A Final Game of Tarot With Death
summary: XIII is a hypnotic and psychedelic card game. Let death read your future with tarot cards and decide your fate. Play the right cards in the right places to keep the scales of karma in check, for that's the only way to delay the inevitable. And never forget: death comes to us all.

name: Xicon Exedra: Minor Advancement
summary:
An RPG game that was first released on June 13th, 2017. The game features creatures from the galaxy known as Formation within the Xicon Exedra Universe. The creatures have transformed into copies of characters outside of the universe as a representation of respect and recognition. A friendly war begins between the galaxy and the Sincrons. Four planets get a representative from each of their worlds to go on a journey to end the war. But what awaits them was unexpected.

This is XiconExertoroyah's first completed RPG game using RPG Maker 2003. A simple game with a simple story.

name: Xi
summary: "Xi" is a horror puzzle game set in the context of modern Chinese folklore. The story takes place in an long-abandoned mountain mansion. This immersive escape room experience feels a bit too real, with eerie and strange elements everywhere—an empty banquet, an endless corridor.

name: XIII Century: Blood of Europe
summary: 1266 AD. Alexander Nevsky, the famous defender of ancient Rus' western borders, is long gone. Having licked their wounds after the Battle on the Ice, knights of the Teutonic Order are again leading their iron wedges to Pskov, a gem of the Northern Rus'. They are out for easy prey and loot. Dovmont, Prince of Pskov, is destined to become a new hope of these lands. Prepare to join his armed force to win fame worthy of the memory of the Grand Prince Alexander! Enjoy historical battles of the Middle Ages here and now. Dovmont will lead his troops against German and Livonian knights and blood of many fearless warriors will spill in the upcoming skirmishes, recreated with all the historical details.

name: Xi-Portal
summary: Unravel the Mystery of Xi-Portal You'll have the chance to join a diverse community of students and explore the exciting world of Xi-Portal alongside captivating characters such as Schneider, Hikari, Ayako, Ai, and KakaMigu.

name: XIII
summary: XIII is a cel-shaded first-person shooter based on the popular Belgian cult comic created by Jean Van Hamme and illustrated by William Vance. The game is loosely based on the first five comics. The player unravels clues, trying to solve a conspiracy set in an environment that breathes a comic book ambiance. Footsteps and shots are visualized in text and actions: for example, headshots are shown in a series of still images. Aside from that, the game has all the typical FPS elements: both stealth and action, more than fifteen weapons (shotguns, crossbows, rifles, ...), interaction with environmental objects and plenty of enemies in levels spread all over the world. During the game, the player can learn a number of skills such as silent walking, lockpicking and dual weapons handling.

name: Xile
summary: Xile

name: Xiama
summary: A puzzle/adventure game set in an Australian rainforest. An updated version of the game, Xiama Revisited, was released in 2007.

name: Xing Yuan Lv Ren: Star wish traveler
summary: "XingYuanLvRen - Star wish traveler" is a visual novel game with an otherworldly adventure theme.The story follows the adventures of a teenager who is summoned to an alien world to help the world defend itself against the "Day of Approval".

name: Xian Xia Di Chen Lu
summary: Xian Xia Di Chen Lu is an open world ARPG game that includes real-time combat, dating development, and multiple plot side options. Its unique feature is that the combat system adopts a rare move mode in RPG genre, hoping to bring players a different experience.

name: Xin Juedai Shuangjiao 2
summary: Based on the Legendary Siblings series by Gu Long.

name: Xidia Gold
summary: Xidia Gold is the expanded rerelease of Unreal Tournament's partial conversion mod Xidia. The original episode was renamed to Xidia: The Incident and the follow up was named Xidia: The Escape.

name: Xin Shen Diao Xia Lu Zhi Wanjie Pian
summary:
Xin Shen Diao Xia Lu Zhi Wanjie Pian is the second installment in the series based on Louis Cha's (better known by his pen name Jin Yong) The Return of the Condor Heroes. Players will control Yang Guo who finds out that his lover Xiaolongnü is still alive after 16 years and sets out to find her.

The game plays like an RPG. Players move Yang Guo using the mouse and battles use a turn-based system where each character out of a party of up to 3 characters can attack as soon as their meter is full.

name: XIX
summary:
A free adult game based on "Teen Titans (2003)". Game set on alternate timeline Where Terra joined Titans instead of Slade. Game begins after Titans defeated Brotherhood of Evil in the show.

You play as a new Titan trainee, who wants to prove himself and become a better titan. On your way towards the goal you develop friendship with 6 Titan girls.
You can either turn the friendship into Relationship or Become a friend with benefits. It's your choice.

name: Xite
summary: A strategy point-and-click survival game

name: Xian Yu
developers: 北京落云轩网络科技有限公司
publishers: 北京落云轩网络科技有限公司

name: Xion
summary:
Xion reVives the arcade and shoot'em ups of the 90's in a refreshing and unique rogue style and destructible voxel landscape setting!

* Blast your way through multiple randomized levels!
* EVERYTTHING is destructible!
* Design and build your own ship!
* Defeat the big bad end-bosses of each level!

Simple, fun and exhilirating gameplay, build the best ship and show it off to your friends!

name: Xibalba
summary: Fight your way through the Mayan Underworld in this retro First Person Shooter. The path leads you through lush jungles, eerie catacombs and high tech bases filled with dangerous creatures, traps, vital powerups and weapons.

name: Xilosaga
summary: Xilosaga is an action and platform game where you play as Tatuapu, an Indian from a local tribe, who ventures out with the aim of purging a plague within the carrancas, which began to attract evil spirits and dominated the inhabitants of northeastern Brazil.

name: XiJiang Shipyard
summary: Create freely in the virtual world.

name: Xiao Xiao No. 4
summary: Xiao Xiao No. 4 is the fourth installment in the Flash web series Xiao Xiao, and the second interactive feature. It is a short rail shooter-type game, where the player moves with a gun through the enemy base along a predefined path, quickly shooting all the enemies that pop up before his health is completely depleted. Sometimes the player must also shoot down projectiles launched by the enemies. There are six bullets in the player's magazine and once they run out the gun must be reloaded by pressing Space. There are three difficulty levels available, each granting the player a different number of lives.

name: Xiào Ào Jiānghú
summary: Xiào Ào Jiānghú is a Chinese RPG based on the book series by Jīn Yōng ( 金庸 )

name: Xin Juedai Shuangjiao 3
summary: Based on the Legendary Siblings series by Gu Long.

name: Xianzong Lu
summary: "Xianzong Lu" is a fairy repair, sandbox, pigeon, business simulation role-playing game, players need to start from 0 to create your Zong door, experience the original Xiuxian novel Shuang Wen plot and the lively meat pigeon brush treasure battle.

name: Ximen Lizhi Biography
summary: "Ximen Lizhi Biography" is a plot development management simulation game with multiple story clues. The main axis of the game is to cultivate Ximen Qing, the male master in the book, who must improve different abilities through various activities or courses in the limited life of the protagonist.

name: Xiangzhe Xingchen yu Shenyuan
summary: Xiangzhe Xingchen yu Shenyuan is a Chinese unofficial fan-made visual novel based on the game Genshin Impact.
developers: Ge Yi Yong Zhi Chanliang Dadui
publishers: Ge Yi Yong Zhi Chanliang Dadui

name: Xi (sai) Little
summary: XI (sai) Little is a Puzzle game, developed by MBI and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Xiong Chuang Tian Xia
summary: Xiong Chuang Tian Xia is a realistic puzzle game set in the Middle Ages. Players will play as a brave warrior, crossing various dangerous levels, challenging powerful bosses, clearing all monsters, and saving people from danger.

name: Xin Yi Tian Tu Long Ji
summary: Xin Yi Tian Tu Long Ji was an RPG published in 2000 by Soft-World International Corporation. The game was adapted from The Heaven Sword and Dragon Saber, also known as Yi Tian Tu Long Ji, a famous Chinese martial arts novel by Jin Yong.

name: Xion Leak
summary: Cooperate quickly as a duo and set the fastest times to win the trophies! Escape before the Xion gas fries your precious circuits! Run fast, be in sync, and avoid the countless dangers that the mysterious Foreman has placed in your path.

name: Xiào Ào Jiānghú 2 Wàizhuàn: Dōngfāng Zàiqǐ
XIIZeal
summary: Enjoy a fast and frantic arcade shmup from Triangle Service! Attack in all directions and rack up the multipliers - do you have XIIZeal?

name: Xiao Xiao No. 2
summary: Xiao Xiao No. 2 is the second installment in the Xiao Xiao Flash web series, and the first one with interactive elements. The player controls a stickman who must get past a wall, avoid cannon fire, and defeat an opponent in one-on-one combat. In each of the three levels the player's role is to press Space when an oscillating "power bar" is at its fullest. If the player presses Space at the wrong time, a cutscene will play in which the hero is killed (there are two possible death scenes, depending on how close the power bar was to its maximum.) However, pressing Space at the right time instead shows a cutscene where the stickman destroys the obstacle and moves on to the next one. The player can also watch all nine cutscenes in a separate video player, accessible from the main menu.

name: Xialuo: Kill All Flowers
summary: Xialuo: Kill All Flowers is an innovative turn based adventure RPG that combines the commonly used "dice elements" and "big map exploration" in board games. In the game, you will gradually uncover various monsters in this dark and mysterious world, achieve your mission.

name: Xilost
summary: The doom of humanity arrives as chemists and scientists experiment with the genetic codings and structurings of all living things, ending up with unwanted infiltrators smuggling into the secret premises, obtaining the powerful genetic-altering chemical mixture that leads to ultimate terrorism.

name: Xibalba
summary: A sprite-based first-person shooter set in the Maya underworld.

name: Xié'è Zhīzǐ
summary: The Son of Evil for the Super A'can

name: Xiangqi: The Chinese Chess
summary: "Xiangqi—the Chinese chess "Is a strategic and challenging chess game, whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, you can find fun and learn in the game. You can search and download the game in the app store, and start enjoying wonderful chess matches!

name: Xicatrice
summary: Around 100 years since superpowers awakened in society, the Anti-Abnormal Unusual Talent Team (AUT) was created to prevent incidents caused by those wrongly using their powers. However, as these efforts became strained, the Reserve Anti-Unusual Talent Team (RAUT) was then formed to assist in tackling such conflict. This group is made up of the aforementioned students. Now, in 2023, the protagonist is a former member of the AUT who lost their powers after an unknown incident.

name: XiuzhenWorld
summary: "XiuzhenWorld" is a 3D stand-alone role-playing game. All equipment and items can be purchased from monsters or in stores. All monsters can be captured and turned into their own spirit beasts. The game has no plot and no tasks. You need to constantly upgrade to get better equipment.

name: Xiao La: Fantasy Dream
summary: Xiao La: Fantasy Dream is a lovely freehand wind Galaxy Castlevania game with a high degree of freedom, in this game, you can use a variety of strange game methods to complete the game! Come on, join the game!

name: Xio: Survival
summary: Xio Survival is an open-world sandbox experience. Survive solo or enter the multiplayer-verse that is vast in size with various biomes to explore. Craft, loot, build and trade your way to riches, however, don't get too comfortable, it can be taken from you quickly.

name: Xiuzhen Idle
summary: This is a xiuzhen simulation placement game! From the refining of qi, building the foundation to the ascension of the celestial realm, crossed into the divine realm.

name: XIII Century: Death or Glory
summary: XIII Century: Death or Glory is an RTS game which immerses players in the Middle Ages. This is a world of noble knights and ruthless nomads, a world of courageous deeds and internal wars.

name: XII Stag
summary: A space shooter with vertically scrolling stages. Based on the arcade version.

name: Xián Shàng Huíyīn
summary: Xián Shàng Huíyīn is a Chinese browser spin-off game for the game Genshin Impact. The game is a rhythm game and was made to celebrate the birthday of the character Venti in 2020. It is only playable on mobile devices.

name: Xiuzhen World 2
summary: Xiuzhen World 2 is a 3D world where your goal is to level up from a mere mortal into an immortal at the end. Its a semi-idle game with fun immortal cultivation mechanics such as - leveling up to become stronger. - capturing monsters as pets to fight for you. - AFK(Away From Keybourd).

name: Xia-Xia
summary: Explore it all in a fun carnival-like adventure with the fun and silly hermit crab characters in Xia-Xia the game. Set out on dozens of missions and along the way, meet kooky friends, and unlock loads of secret rewards in five unique worlds across 25 levels! Keep your eyes open, you must discover the hidden starfish in each world to move on to other adventures. With more than 30 collectible shells to uncover and over 60 missing friends to seek out, Xia-Xia the game provides hours of fun for all ages!

name: Xiphos
summary:
Xiphos is an action/strategy/war game realized in 3D for the Amiga, Atari ST, IBM PC and compatible computers, resembling Elite

To play Xiphos you will need fast reactions, skill and wisdom. You will take part in complex space battles, dock with space bases, talk to aliens and trade for the supplies you need to traverse the six universes of the Xiphon system.
